actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to clarify the regulatory authority under that act over vitamins and minerals.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Revises the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act by specifying that the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare may not classify any vitamin or mineral as a drug solely because it exceeds the level which is nutritionally rational or useful.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to clarify the regulatory authority under that act over vitamins and minerals.
